(2) Try to assemble your own crew with your money and go on a daring voyage!
Port Dumswith.
You've always wanted to go to the sea, so you travel across the Scarlet expanse towards Port Dumswith. 
It’s even more beautiful than you ever imagined!
You start looking for someone to join on a daring adventure. 
Unfortunately, the merchants only offer you a ride straight to Port Fallow. 
They warn the water currents are too treacherous for the unskilled. 
The current could crush you against the sharp rocks of the high cliffs of Uriella!
